entry.title: Monday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries changing to flurries at times heavy near noon. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm except 5 cm over mountainous terrain. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
